To perform a silent installation the twe-4.8-1.silent.properties file must be in the same directory of your installation file. The following lists the properties which can set.
listitem.programlisting: # Where to install Together Workflow Editor (default value is C:\Program Files\twe-4.8-1)inst.dir=C:\Program Files\twe-4.8-1 # Startup menu name. (default value - Together Workflow Editor 4.8-1) startup.menu.name=Together Workflow Editor 4.8-1 # Path to local java installation (obligate - has no default value) jdk.dir=C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_11 # Create start menu entry (on/off) create.startup.menu=on # Create quick launch menu icon (on/off) create.quick.launch.icon=on # Create desktop icon (on/off) create.desktop.icon=on # Create pin to taskbar icon (on/off) create.pin.to.taskbar=on
